PSXDataSelector.nativeStatement: SELECT ROLES.ROLENAME, ROLES.ROLEID FROM ROLES ROLES,STATEROLES STATEROLES,TRANSITIONS TRANSITIONS WHERE TRANSITIONS.TRANSITIONID = :"PSXParam/transitionid" AND TRANSITIONS.WORKFLOWAPPID = :"PSXParam/workflowid" AND TRANSITIONS.TRANSITIONFROMSTATEID = STATEROLES.STATEID AND TRANSITIONS.WORKFLOWAPPID = STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND STATEROLES.ROLEID = ROLES.ROLEID AND STATEROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID = ROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID AND STATEROLES.ASSIGNMENTTYPE > 2 AND ROLES.ROLEID NOT IN (SELECT TRANSITIONROLES.TRANSITIONROLEID FROM TRANSITIONROLES TRANSITIONROLES WHERE TRANSITIONROLES.WORKFLOWAPPID = :"PSXParam/workflowid" AND TRANSITIONROLES.TRANSITIONID = :"PSXParam/transitionid") ORDER BY ROLES.ROLENAME ASC

PSXDataSet.name: CopyWorkflowEdit
PSXDataSet.description: Resource for copy workflow edit page.
